Text: Any way to get a Mac version up?
Am downloading now. Will post later with the results. So far it looks legit to me so yay.
It works great. You do have to download something else to make it work though. Just search for "Plogue ARIA Engine" and that's all you have to get. Really easy to all download. Thanks for the upload.

Looks like standalone works fine, but when you use it as a vst under cubase (in my case) it acts like the demo so... useless for me. Shame that it's a really good vst, but too expensive. Anyone know a good  alternative?
This doesn't work. When I run the patch, all it does is add an image file to he chipsounds folder.
